segments.text: Yes , I am . I always make a plan before I do anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do you want to be in 5 years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't want to have a specific title . I just want to enjoy what I am doing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the most important thing to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you are hired , how long do you plan to stay with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That obviously depends on how things go - - whether I'm suited to the firm and the firm to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me about some of your recent goals and what you do to achieve them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to put my knowledge and experience to use in a challenging position . In order to achieve this goal , I just want to work step by step .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't thought it over at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the most important thing when looking for a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the most important thing is the interest in the job .
segments.speaker: S2
